description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Jefferson's notes on the State of Virginia; With the Appendixes ... To which is subjoined a sublime and argumentative dissertation on Mr. Jefferson's Religious principles [entitled: A Vindication of the Religion of Mr. Jefferson and a statement of his services in the cause of religious liberty. By a friend to real religion]", "Single Works" Author: Jefferson, Thomas Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 1431.e.17." Page: 255 Place of Publishing: Baltimore Date of Publishing: 1800 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001859377 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
